title: 2001/216/EC: Council Decision of 19 March 2001 amending the Council Rules of Procedure
header:
Council Decision
of 19 March 2001
amending the Council Rules of Procedure
(2001/216/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community and in particular Article 207(3) thereof,
Whereas it is appropriate to amend Article 24 of the Council Rules of Procedure(1),
main_body:
As from 13 March 2001, Article 24 of the Council Rules of Procedure shall be replaced by the following:
"Article 24
Security
The rules on security shall be adopted by the Council acting by a qualified majority."
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 March 2001.
For the Council
The President
A. Lindh
(1) OJ L 149, 23.6.2000, p. 21.
